ABOUT_ME_DESCRIPTION: I have a strong interest in both web and mobile technologies. I love to analyze various web applications, find meaningful insights, develop a prototype, and show the outcome through a web application. I have over two years of experience as a full stack developer and lecturer at Prime University, where I built and taught web technologies using React and Node.js. Due to my passion for web technologies, I have developed some knowledge in both frontend and backend development. I have good knowledge of frontend frameworks and libraries such as Angular, React, Flask, HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, Tailwind CSS, and Redux. I also have experience in backend development with PHP, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, and RESTful API. I am well-versed with test automation tools like Jest and am familiar with Git-based version control. Furthermore, I am currently learning React Native and want to learn about the deployment environment for a hybrid mobile app.
EXPERIENCE_BOSCH_DESCRIPTION: Developed and maintained web applications using Angular, PHP, and MySQL.
EXPERIENCE_PRIME_DESCRIPTION: Assisted in teaching web development courses and providing support to students.
EDUCATION_CHEMNITZ_DESCRIPTION: Completed courses like Database and Web Techniques, Empirical Software Engineering.
EDUCATION_IUT_DESCRIPTION: Completed courses like Artificial Intelligence, Web Engineering, and Machine Learning.
